decision_conditions: Standard time limit - Trees Con Area
description: T5 London Plane;Prune to clear lamp column by 0.5 metres. T2067 London Plane;Crown lift to a height of approximately 5.0 metres over road only.T2075 Goat Willow;Pollard remaining two stems at previous points (approximately 3.0 metres high).T2084 Hawthorn;Crown lift to a height of approximately 3.0 metres by removing lowest limb. T2085 London Plane;Crown lift to a height of approximately 5.0 metres over access road. T2088 Sycamore;Remove hanging branches. Crown lift to a height of 3.0 metres.T2092 London Plane;Crown lift to a height of approximately 5.0 metres to clear building. Remove hanging branches.T2104 Ash;Prune to clear wire by 1.0-2.0 metres. Crown lift to a height of approximately 3.0 metres.  T2105 Ash;Prune to clear aerial and building by 1.0-2.0 metres. T2017 Pear;Crown lift to a height of approximately 3.0 metres. Clear epicormic growth. T2111 Ash (tagged T2110);Crown lift to a height of approximately 3.0 metres. Clear epicormic growth up to 3.0 metres. T2113 False Acacia;Crown lift to a height of approximately 3.0 metres.  T2114 Oak;Crown lift to a height of approximately 3.0 metres.T2120 Ash;Remove hanging branch. Crown lift to a height of 3.0 metres over grass area only.N2263 Hawthorn;Prune back to fenceline for full height (and adjacent Ash suckers).  N3454 London Plane;Crown lift to a height of approximately 3.0 metres back to boundary. N3455 Lime;Crown lift to a height of approximately 3.0 metres back to boundary. N4000 Willow;Remove all overhanging branches back to the boundary to prevent failure into unused area. N4001 Cherry;Prune back to boundary. T2059 London Plane;Crown lift to a height of approximately 5.0 metres over road only.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
